note: For each scenario, verify INPUTS (all 3 categories) against OUTPUTS using an external tool. When satisfied, run: npm run test:approve

scenarios.description: Standard first-time Israeli buyer, no rental, typical inputs
branches: loan limit: income (DTI 33%) is binding over LTV

scenarios.description: Budget for a low-equity buyer — final price likely below 1,978,745 → purchase tax = 0
Buyer whose result price lands in the 3.5% SINGLE_HOME tax bracket (1.97M–2.35M)
Second property purchase → INVESTOR tax profile (flat 8% from 0)
First property but non-Israeli resident → INVESTOR profile (foreign buyer)
Very high income — LTV cap restricts the loan before income does
branches: actual LTV in result should be exactly at the LTV cap

scenarios.description: High equity but low income — DTI ratio limits the loan amount
User sets an explicit monthly payment ceiling via budgetCap
Investment property with no explicit rent — rent estimated from yield
User provides a specific expected rent value — overrides yield calculation
branches: expectedRent != null && > 0 → uses explicit rent directly

scenarios.description: Explicit rent far above market estimate → rentWarning = high
Explicit rent far below market estimate → rentWarning = low
enable_rent_validation=false → rentWarning stays null even with extreme rent
Borrower age equals or exceeds maxAge → calculateMaxBudget returns null
branches: years = min(max_loan_term_years, maxAge - age) ≤ 0 → return null

scenarios.description: Interest rate = 1 (minimum allowed) → standard amortization branch
show_amortization_table=true → amortizationTable is populated and mathematically consistent
Luxury home price > 6,055,070 → lands in the 8% SINGLE_HOME bracket
Ultra-luxury home price > 20,183,565 → lands in the 10% SINGLE_HOME bracket
Investor purchase > 6,055,070 → lands in the 10% INVESTOR bracket
First property purchase where user will rent it out → uses rent_recognition_first_property
Partner config has 0% for variable fees and 0 NIS for fixed fees
branches: closingCosts logic with zeroed config values

scenarios.description: Effective years reduced because age is close to maxAge
